default.ally: You have earned the arena's respect. Do not waste it.
default.neutral: Win your next match and we can talk terms.
default.enemy: I own this pit. You are no longer welcome in it.

flags.betrayed: You crossed me once. There is no second bargain.

default.ally: Keep your guard high. We finish this together.
default.neutral: Your footwork is better. Your judgment still needs work.
default.enemy: I taught you to survive. I did not teach you mercy.

flags.revealed: Now you know why I kept secrets. Move carefully.

default.ally: You stood for me. I stand for you.
default.neutral: We both know this city chews people up.
default.enemy: We are done. Keep your distance.

flags.rescued: You pulled me out when no one else would.

default.ally: The shrine remembers your name for the right reasons.
default.neutral: Faith is a ledger too. Every debt is counted.
default.enemy: The shrine doors are closed to you now.

default.ally: I am still here because you did not run.
default.neutral: Coin talks. You listen, maybe we both eat.
default.enemy: I should have never trusted you.

flags.injured: Do not look at me like that. I knew the risk.

default.ally: Serve well and your name may survive this season.
default.neutral: Everything here has a price. Including you.
default.enemy: I decide who is remembered and who disappears.
